title: Mujib Bhai
overview: “Mujib Bhai”, an animated feature film produced under the concern of ICT Division, Bangladesh aims to deal with this current uprising anarchy and motivate our people once again in the light of Bangabandhu’s political career. The inspiration of Bangabandhu’s political career lies in the unfair, demeaning and rage inducing treatment of the Indian subcontinent people by the British dominance.
